events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position. The resume showcases solid experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The application has been categorized under Engineering as the candidate's skills align with the software developer role requirements mentioned in the job description.
A recruiter with experience in technical hiring has been assigned to oversee the candidate's recruitment process and coordinate upcoming interviews.
Initial screening call was conducted to assess candidate’s communication skills and confirm their experience with software development methodologies and cloud technologies.
Candidate responded positively to the interview invitation and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity to join our engineering team and work on cutting-edge projects.
The technical interview has been scheduled for next Monday with the engineering leads to evaluate the candidate’s coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
